titleStmt.title: Three hymns based on the trishagion, the first one acrostic

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Looks pretty good. Add over/understokes in l. 1, followed by -------- not ----; add overstrokes on nomina sacra (ll. 2, 6, 11, 22); encode Ὦ at end of l. 13; number tag at end of l. 17; encode <:Ἕσπερον|reg|Ἕσπειρεν:> in l. 25; remove subscript in non-regularized form in l. 28; print <:κατῆλθεν|reg|κατελθεν:> in l. 30. Review meta before finalization.

Submit - Text typed in and encoded from the ed.pr. Sometimes, I have interpreted corrections slightly differently as the ed.: I generally preferred reg-s to angle brackets. I omitted indicating quotations with "", since I did not find the system of the ed. convincing and this would have introduced another layer of (at least in my view) unnecessary complications. Please read carefully, since the text was typed in by hand and contains a lot of scribal mistakes.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Looks pretty good. Add over/understokes in l. 1, followed by -------- not ----; add overstrokes on nomina sacra (ll. 2, 6, 11, 22); encode Ὦ at end of l. 13; number tag at end of l. 17; encode <:Ἕσπερον|reg|Ἕσπειρεν:> in l. 25; remove subscript in non-regularized form in l. 28; print <:κατῆλθεν|reg|κατελθεν:> in l. 30. Review meta before finalization.

Submit - Text typed in and encoded from the ed.pr. Sometimes, I have interpreted corrections slightly differently as the ed.: I generally preferred reg-s to angle brackets. I omitted indicating quotations with "", since I did not find the system of the ed. convincing and this would have introduced another layer of (at least in my view) unnecessary complications. Please read carefully, since the text was typed in by hand and contains a lot of scribal mistakes.

listBibl.bibl: Arzt-Grabner, Light from the East, p. 216
